thread.title: Obama gives political advice to Kanye West at SF fundraiser
thread.title_full: Obama gives political advice to Kanye West at SF fundraiser - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Obama gives political advice to Kanye West at SF fundraiser
text: President Obama offered some political advice to Kanye West when Obama opened for Kanye — yes, you read that right, the leader of the free world opened for Jeezy — Saturday at a DNC fundraiser at the Warfield Theatre in San Francisco. Here is the official White House transcript of Obama’s remarks. The media was escorted out of the theater before West took the stage. REMARKS BY THE PRESIDENT AT DNC EVENT Warfield Theater San Francisco, California 10:34 A.M. PDT THE PRESIDENT: Hello, San Francisco! (Applause.) Hello, hello! (Applause.) Hello! It’s good to see you. Everybody, have a seat, have a seat. (Applause.) Thank you! Thank you. It’s good to ...
